text: obaṭa pera ikutva giya nūh, ād, samūd væni janatāvangē itihāsayanda, ovungen pasu pæmiṇi ayagē itihāsayanda, obaṭa læbunē nædda? ovunva (ovungē vistara) allāh hæra vena kisivekuṭat dæna gata nohæka. ema janatāva veta yavanu læbū (apagē) dūtayin pæhædili sādhakayan samaga ovun veta pæmiṇa “(ṛju mārgayaṭa enu, enu” yayi tamangē dǣtama digu kara ārādhanā kaḷa) avasthāvēdī ovungē at ovungē kaṭa desaṭama tallū kara damā (ovunṭa) “niyata vaśayenma api (deviyangē dūtayin yanna prakāra) oba gena ā dæya pratikṣēpa karannemu. tavada oba apava kumak desaṭa ārādhanā karannehuda, ē gæna niyata vaśayenma api imahat vū sækayehima siṭinnemu” yayi pævasūha
